alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 02 at 8:25PM CST until February 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches tonight through tomorrow. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills dropping down to around 15 below zero. * WHERE...Beaver County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until Noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes. The dangerously cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
